Well I can't confirm or deny the accuracy of the statement itself, 
except=
 to wonder when in the Edo period.  To my knowledge, the value of 
coin man=
y times fluctuated heavily especially since it was a rice based 
economy.  =
Another factor is the minting itself which varied in quality 
and quantity =
and I know that inflation and widespread dept 
cancellations had a big infl=
uence as well.  All and all, regardless of 
the source I would have to ques=
tion the accuracy of the number itself 
regardless just because of all thes=
e factors.
